transcript: Why should we dream of him walk the night's waiting for him? Do we contradict him? Do we say straight out that we have no hope anymore? That we haven't had any hope for years now?

segments.text: Why should we dream of him walk the night's waiting for him?
Do we contradict him? Do we say straight out that we have no hope anymore?
That we haven't had any hope for years now?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Why shouldn't he dream of him?  Walk the nights waiting for him?  Do we contradict him?  Do we say straight out that we have no hope anymore, that we haven't had any hope for years now?
